plays.text: 2 minute Bench Penalty for Delay of Game served by Dan LaCouture
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for High Sticking Karl Dykhuis
Penalty to Shean Donovan 2 minutes for Roughing Doug Gilmour
Goal scored by Chad Kilger assisted by Andreas Dackell and Patrice Brisebois
Penalty to Jan Bulis 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Shean Donovan
Goal scored by Milan Kraft assisted by Marc Bergevin and Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Jan Bulis 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Jan Hrdina
Goal scored by Martin Straka assisted by Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Steve McKenna 2 minutes for Diving Craig Rivet
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Hooking Steve McKenna
Goal scored by Martin Straka assisted by Jan Hrdina and Mario Lemieux
Penalty to Wayne Primeau 2 minutes for Hooking Yanic Perreault
Penalty to Donald Audette 2 minutes for Hooking Hans Jonsson
Goal scored by Craig Rivet assisted by Saku Koivu and Jan Bulis
